description: After I installed it it does not work.
It is a nice program, I would maybe pay for it if it had all I needed for Gantt charts. Currently I have seen no option to add connections between gantt tasks or to add a critical path.

I have been using it for years. Great compatability. Con - licensing terms are false and company does not stand by it. Yet it is cheaper than anything else on the market with this level of support and features!
This is a great multi-platform alternative to VISIO. Extensive library and templates. My only complaint is that it requires to you re-validate (login) your installation every thirty days.
